item.text: “Do not let your hearts be distressed. You believe in God; believe also in me.

There <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="3438">dwelling places</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962">Father’s</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1490">Otherwise</st>, I would have <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st><n id="3" /> I am <st data-num="4198">going away</st> to <st data-num="2090">make ready</st><n id="4" /> a <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2090">make ready</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="5117">place</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3880" class="">take</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1683">be with me</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> may <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>.
And you know the way where I am going.”
Thomas said, “Lord, we don’t know where you are going. How can we know the way?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">way</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3762">No one</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1487 3361">except</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.
If you have known me, you will know my Father too. And from now on you do know him and have seen him.”
Philip said, “Lord, show us the Father, and we will be content.”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “Have I <st data-num="1510" class="">been</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> for <st data-num="5118" class="">so</st> <st data-num="5550" class="">long</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> yet you have <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">known</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st>? The person who has <st data-num="3708" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> has <st data-num="3708" class="">seen</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>! <st data-num="4459" class="">How</st> can <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="1166">Show</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father’</st>?

Do you <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>?<n id="1" /> The <st data-num="4487" class="">words</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="575" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1683">my own</st> initiative,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">residing</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">performs</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> miraculous <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="4100" class="">Believe</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> is <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> believe <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> of the miraculous <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">themselves</st>.

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281">solemn</st> <st data-num="281">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> the person who <st data-num="4100" class="">believes</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> will <st data-num="4160" class="">perform</st><n id="2" /> the miraculous <st data-num="2041">deeds</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st>,<n id="4" /> and will <st data-num="4160" class="">perform</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="3173" class="">greater</st> deeds<n id="6" /> <st data-num="3173" class="">than</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="4198" class="">going</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> I will <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3739 5100">whatever</st> you <st data-num="154" class="">ask</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> may be <st data-num="1392" class="">glorified</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st>.
If you ask me anything in my name, I will do it.
“If you love me, you will obey my commandments.

<st data-num="2504">Then<n id="1" /> I</st> will <st data-num="2065" class="">ask</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he will <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> <st data-num="3875" class="">Advocate</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519 165">foreve</st>r—
the Spirit of truth, whom the world cannot accept because it does not see him or know him. But you know him because he resides with you and will be in you.
“I will not abandon you as orphans, I will come to you.

In a <st data-num="3398">little</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">while</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> will <st data-num="3765" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2334" class="">see</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3765">any longer</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="2334" class="">see</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me;</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>.

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> will <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="1565">that</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">time</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962">Father</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2504">and I</st> am <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.
The person who has my commandments and obeys them is the one who loves me. The one who loves me will be loved by my Father, and I will love him and will reveal myself to him.”
“Lord,” Judas (not Judas Iscariot) said, “what has happened that you are going to reveal yourself to us and not to the world?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="25" class="">loves</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, he will <st data-num="5083" class="">obey</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> will <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> we will <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160">take up</st> <st data-num="3438" class="">residence</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="3" />
The person who does not love me does not obey my words. And the word you hear is not mine, but the Father’s who sent me.
“I have spoken these things while staying with you.
But the Advocate, the Holy Spirit, whom the Father will send in my name, will teach you everything and will cause you to remember everything I said to you.
“Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you; I do not give it to you as the world does. Do not let your hearts be distressed or lacking in courage.

You <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3004">say</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘I am <st data-num="5217">going away</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I am <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> back <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.’ <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> you <st data-num="25" class="">loved</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, you would be <st data-num="5463" class="">glad</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I am <st data-num="4198" class="">going</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3173">greater</st> than <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am.<n id="3" />

I have <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="4250" class="">before</st> it <st data-num="1096" class="">happens</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> it <st data-num="1096" class="">happens</st> you may <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st>.<n id="1" />

I will <st data-num="3765" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">much</st> <st data-num="3765" class="">longer</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="758" class="">ruler</st> of this <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> is <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st>.<n id="2" /> He <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="3762">no power</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">over</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>,<n id="3" />
but I am doing just what the Father commanded me, so that the world may know that I love the Father. Get up, let us go from here.
